remarks:
A modus ponens deduction.  A translation of natural deduction rule ` -> ` E ( ` -> ` elimination), see ~ natded .  Deduction form of ~ ax-mp and inference associated with ~ a2i .  (Contributed by NM, 29-Dec-1992.)

 A modus ponens deduction.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
mpd.1 $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
mpd.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
mpd $p |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
